contentrichtext.text: '''VMX''' may refer to: * Vintage [[Motocross]] * Vintela Management Extensions, which extend [[Microsoft Systems Management Server]] (SMS) to [[Unix-like]] systems (Vintela are now owned by [[Quest Software]], and the extensions are now called Quest Management Xtensions for SMS) * Virtual Machine eXtensions instructions on processors with [[x86 virtualization]] * Voice Message Exchange, an early version of [[voicemail]] invented by American [[Gordon Matthews (inventor)|Gordon Matthews]] * [[VMX (Tiscali TV)| V:MX]] - an on-demand music television service * [[AltiVec]] - a [[floating point]] and integer [[SIMD]] [[instruction set]] previously called VMX by [[IBM]] * XML messaging gateway to [[VisionPLUS]] - a messaging exchange system file {{disambig-cleanup|date=March 2013}}
